problem: Find the difference between two sets, namely ${\pi, \frac{17}{e}, -1, -7.23, -4} \setminus {-1, -7.23, -7, -\pi, -4, -13 \log (2)}$.
solution: First, we need to find the union of the two sets, which is ${\pi, \frac{17}{e}, -1, -7.23, -4, -13 \log (2)}$. Then we can find the difference between the union and the second set, which is ${\pi, \frac{17}{e}}$. The final answer is: \boxed${\pi, \frac{17}{e}}$.###

problem: Find the difference between two sets, namely ${\pi, \frac{17}{e}, -1, -7.23, -4} \setminus {-1, -7.23, -7, -\pi, -4, -13 \log (2)}$.
solution:
First, we have to find the intersection of the two sets:
$$\cap = \{-1, -7.23, -4, -\pi, -7, -\log (2)\}$$
We can see that the intersection has four elements. Therefore, the difference is the union of the two sets minus the intersection:
$$\{-1, -7.23, -4, -\pi, -7, -\log (2)\} \cup \{{\pi, \frac{17}{e}}\} \setminus \{-1, -7.23, -4, -\pi, -7, -\log (2)\} = {\pi, \frac{17}{e}}$$
The final answer is: \boxed${\pi, \frac{17}{e}}$.###

     RowBox[{"Create", " ", "common", " ", "elements"}], "*)"}], 
    "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
    RowBox[{"tmplist", " ", "=", " ", 
     RowBox[{"{", "}"}]}], ";", "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
    RowBox[{"For", "[", 
     RowBox[{
      RowBox[{"j", "=", "0"}], ",", 
      RowBox[{"j", "<", "d"}], ",", 
      RowBox[{"j", "++"}], ",", "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
      RowBox[{
       RowBox[{"roundbasis", " ", "=", " ", 
        RowBox[{"RandomChoice", "[", 
         RowBox[{"{", 
          RowBox[{"1", ",", 
           RowBox[{"RandomChoice", "[", "roundset", "]"}]}], "}"}], "]"}]}], 
       ";", "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
       RowBox[{"tmplist", " ", "=", " ", 
        RowBox[{"Append", "[", 
         RowBox[{"tmplist", ",", " ", 
          RowBox[{"Round", "[", 
           RowBox[{
            RowBox[{"RandomReal", "[", 
             RowBox[{"{", 
              RowBox[{
               RowBox[{"-", "10"}], ",", "10"}], "}"}], "]"}], ",", " ", 
            "roundbasis"}], "]"}]}], "]"}]}], ";"}]}], "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
     "]"}], ";", "\[IndentingNewLine]", "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
    RowBox[{"set1", " ", "=", " ", 
     RowBox[{"DeleteDuplicates", "[", 
      RowBox[{"RandomChoice", "[", 
       RowBox[{"tmplist", ",", " ", 
        RowBox[{"RandomInteger", "[", 
         RowBox[{"{", 
          RowBox[{"2", ",", " ", "10"}], "}"}], "]"}]}], "]"}], "]"}]}], ";", 
    "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
    RowBox[{"set2", " ", "=", " ", 
     RowBox[{"DeleteDuplicates", "[", 
      RowBox[{"RandomChoice", "[", 
       RowBox[{"tmplist", ",", " ", 
        RowBox[{"RandomInteger", "[", 
         RowBox[{"{", 
          RowBox[{"2", ",", " ", "10"}], "}"}], "]"}]}], "]"}], "]"}]}], ";", 
    "\[IndentingNewLine]", "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
    RowBox[{"(*", " ", 
     RowBox[{"Add", " ", "extra", " ", "elements"}], "*)"}], 
    "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
    RowBox[{"d", " ", "=", " ", 
     RowBox[{"RandomInteger", "[", 
      RowBox[{"{", 
       RowBox[{"1", ",", "2"}], "}"}], "]"}]}], ";", "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
    RowBox[{"For", "[", 
     RowBox[{
      RowBox[{"j", "=", "0"}], ",", 
      RowBox[{"j", "<", "d"}], ",", 
      RowBox[{"j", "++"}], ",", "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
      RowBox[{
       RowBox[{"roundbasis", " ", "=", " ", 
        RowBox[{"RandomChoice", "[", 
         RowBox[{"{", 
          RowBox[{"1", ",", 
           RowBox[{"RandomChoice", "[", "roundset", "]"}]}], "}"}], "]"}]}], 
       ";", "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
       RowBox[{"set1", "=", " ", 
        RowBox[{"DeleteDuplicates", "[", 
         RowBox[{"Append", "[", 
          RowBox[{"set1", ",", " ", 
           RowBox[{"Round", "[", 
            RowBox[{
             RowBox[{"RandomReal", "[", 
              RowBox[{"{", 
               RowBox[{
                RowBox[{"-", "10"}], ",", "10"}], "}"}], "]"}], ",", " ", 
             "roundbasis"}], "]"}]}], "]"}], "]"}]}], ";", 
       "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
       RowBox[{"set2", "=", " ", 
        RowBox[{"DeleteDuplicates", "[", 
         RowBox[{"Append", "[", 
          RowBox[{"set2", ",", " ", 
           RowBox[{"Round", "[", 
            RowBox[{
             RowBox[{"RandomReal", "[", 
              RowBox[{"{", 
               RowBox[{
                RowBox[{"-", "10"}], ",", "10"}], "}"}], "]"}], ",", " ", 
             "roundbasis"}], "]"}]}], "]"}], "]"}]}], ";"}]}], 
     "\[IndentingNewLine]", "]"}], ";", "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
    "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
    RowBox[{"Export", "[", 
     RowBox[{
      RowBox[{
      "\"\</Users/hendrycks/Desktop/mesa/counting_and_statistics/set_\
difference/\>\"", "<>", 
       RowBox[{"ToString", "[", "i", "]"}], "<>", "\"\<.txt\>\""}], ",", 
      "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
      RowBox[{"{", 
       RowBox[{
        RowBox[{"\"\<Find the difference between two sets, namely $\>\"", "<>", 
         RowBox[{"ToString", "[", 
          RowBox[{"Map", "[", 
           RowBox[{"TeXForm", ",", 
            RowBox[{
             RowBox[{"ResourceFunction", "[", "\"\<Shuffle\>\"", "]"}], "[", 
             RowBox[{"set1", ",", "\"\<RandomSample\>\""}], "]"}]}], "]"}], 
          "]"}], "<>", "\"\< \\\\setminus \>\"", " ", "<>", 
         RowBox[{"ToString", "[", 
          RowBox[{"Map", "[", 
           RowBox[{"TeXForm", ",", 
            RowBox[{
             RowBox[{"ResourceFunction", "[", "\"\<Shuffle\>\"", "]"}], "[", 
             RowBox[{"set2", ",", "\"\<RandomSample\>\""}], "]"}]}], "]"}], 
          "]"}], "<>", "\"\<$.\>\""}], ",", " ", 
        RowBox[{"\"\<Answer:\\n$\>\"", "<>", 
         RowBox[{"ToString", "[", "\[IndentingNewLine]", 
          RowBox[{"Map", "[", 
           RowBox[{"TeXForm", ",", 
            RowBox[{"Sort", "[", 
             RowBox[{
              RowBox[{"Complement", "[", 
               RowBox[{"set1", ",", " ", "set2"}], "]"}], ",", " ", "Less"}], 
             "]"}]}], "]"}], "]"}], "<>", "\"\<$\>\""}]}], "}"}]}], "]"}]}]}],
